CustomField.description: Total number of business days excluding holidays in the month.
CustomField.formula: (( FLOOR ( ( DATE ( YEAR (DATE (YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),28)+5), MONTH(DATE (YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),28)+5), 1 ) - 5 - DATE (1900,01,01) ) / 7 ) *5 ) + MIN ( 5, MOD ( DATE ( YEAR (DATE (YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),28)+5), MONTH(DATE (YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),28)+5), 1 ) - 5 - DATE (1900,01,01), 7 ) ) ) - ( ( FLOOR ( ( DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),1) - DATE (1900,01,01) ) / 7 ) *5 ) + MIN ( 5, MOD ( DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),1) - DATE (1900,01,01), 7 )-5 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total number of business days excluding holidays in the month.
CustomField.label: Number of Calling Days Total This Month
